parameters.jsCode:
const rows = $input.first().json.queryResults || [];
const items = rows.map(row => ({
  id: row.id,
  tenantId: row.tenant_id,
  nom: row.nom,
  prenom: row.prenom,
  email: row.email,
  poste: row.poste,
  departement: row.departement,
  contratType: row.contrat_type,
  dateEmbauche: row.date_embauche,
  salairesBase: row.salaire_base,
  manager: row.manager,
  actif: row.actif,
  userId: row.user_id,
  createdAt: row.created_at,
  updatedAt: row.updated_at
}));

return [{json: {success: true, data: {items: items}}}];
